entry.title: [cs231n] Module 1-Linear classification: Support Vector Machine, Softmax
entry.content:
After two photos, I will take my notes through Markdown.

Loss function

How to measure our unhappiness with outcomes? $ ightarrow$ a loss function(also called as the cost function or the objective)

Multi-class Support Vector Machine loss

Can't well understand this part :(

A commonly used loss: Multi-class Support Vector Machine(SVM) loss.

Look at $x_i$ who has a label $y_i$. So $f(x_i,\mathbf{W})$ is a vector of score of each labels. The j-th class score is $s_j=f(x_i,\mathbf{W})j$. The Multi-class SVM loss for the i-th example is then formalized as:
$$
L_i = \sum{j eq y_i} max(0,s_j-s_{y_i}+ \Delta )
$$

Ex There are three classes and the score $ s=[13,-7,11] $. We can see that the first is correct. That means $y_i = 1$ Now we let $\Delta=10$ and then put it into SVM we defined before. We can see:

$$
L_i = \sum_{j eq 1} max(0,s_j-s_1+ \Delta )=max(0,-7-13+10)+max(0,11-13+10)
$$

We find that the first item is 0 and the second is bigger than 1. That means the difference between $s_1(13)$ and $s_2(-7)$ is bigger than $\Delta (10)$ but for $s_1$ and $s_3$, that not happen.

So that’s the purpose of SVM: we want the score of correct class to be larger than the incorrect class at least $\Delta$. If not, we will accumulate loss.

We can also write $L_i$ in another form:
$$
L_i = \sum {j eq y_i}max(w_j^Tx_i - w{y_i}^T x_i + \Delta)
$$
in which $w_j$ is the j-th row of W reshaped as a column

entry.title: Modelling Group: introduction about Markdown and LaTeX
entry.content:
Markdown

What is markdown?

  • language(light)
  • easy to control

Titles

I’m 1

I’m 2

I’m 3

I’m 4

I’m 5
I’m 6

####### I’m 7

for title: 1-6, no 7

bold, italic, bold&italic

I am a sentence. I like eat beef.

I am a student.

links, photos

Baidu

quote

Lu Xun: people should eat.

list: 2 types

  • one
    • two
  • three
    • four
      • five
  1. 1
  2. 3

if no " ":

1.123

code

table

Header OneHeader Two
Item OneItem Two

others

I eat rubbish yesterday

this sentence is important

I must do something.[1]

math

We all know that 2+3=5

we all know that $1+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{2}$。$2^2=4$, $CO_2$, $x_{11}$
$$
1+\frac{1}{2}
$$

$$
\begin{pmatrix}
x_{11} & x_{12} \
x_{21} & x_{22}
\end{pmatrix}
$$

$$
X=\sum^{n}{i=1} \frac{\Pi{j=1}^{m}x_{ij}}{\sigma_{i}k_i^2}
$$

$$
\begin{equation}
x=\frac{\partial T}{\partial V}c_{Boltzman}\alpha_x
\end{equation}
$$

$$
\begin{equation*}
y=\frac{\partial T}{\partial M}c_{Boltzman}\alpha_y
\end{equation*}
$$

$$
\begin{equation}
z=\frac{\partial T}{\partial K}c_{Boltzman}\alpha_z
\end{equation}
$$

$$
\begin{align}
1&=0+1\
2&=1+1-0-1+1\
444&=400+40+4
\end{align}
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
a+b+c&=x\
x&=a+b+c
\end{align*}
$$

$$
A+B\rightarrow C\
$$

entry.title: Hello world

HELLO WOELD

My First Try of Blog

My blog will all in English, recording some courses notes and daily feelings.
